properties.name: jwt.access-secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT access token

properties.name: jwt.refresh-secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT refresh token

properties.name: jwt.access-expiration
properties.description: Expiration time for JWT access token in milliseconds

properties.name: jwt.refresh-expiration
properties.description: Expiration time for JWT refresh token in milliseconds

properties.name: frontend.url
properties.description: Frontend application URL for OAuth2 redirects and CORS configuration

properties.name: password.validation.pattern
properties.description: Regular expression pattern for password validation

properties.name: security.refresh-rotation.enabled
properties.description: Enable refresh token rotation and reuse detection

properties.name: security.refresh-rotation.revoke-on-reuse
properties.description: Revoke refresh token family when reuse is detected

properties.name: security.refresh-rotation.max-families-per-user
properties.description: Maximum number of active refresh token families per user

properties.name: security.refresh-rotation.cleanup-enabled
properties.description: Enable cleanup of expired refresh tokens

properties.name: security.refresh-rotation.cleanup-expired-after-days
properties.description: Delete refresh tokens expired more than N days ago
